trans-unit.source: Contains information on a tracked <xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关跟踪的信息<xref href="System.Activities.Activity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"></xref> class using the specified name, ID, instance ID and type name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"></xref>类使用指定的名称、 ID、 实例 ID 和类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活动的名称。

trans-unit.source: The activity ID.
trans-unit.target: 活动 id。

trans-unit.source: The instance ID of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活动的实例 ID。

trans-unit.source: The type name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活动的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID for the activity.
trans-unit.target: 获取活动的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The activity ID.
trans-unit.target: 活动 id。

trans-unit.source: Gets the run-time ID of the activity instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取活动实例的运行时 ID。

trans-unit.source: An activity can occur multiple times during processing, such as an activity that is processed within a loop.
trans-unit.target: 活动可在处理期间，如在循环内处理的活动发生多次。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A> contains the ID of the activity and does not change while the InstanceId contains the ID of the specific instance of the activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>包含活动的 ID，不会更改而 InstanceId 包含活动特定实例的 ID。</xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: The InstanceId is different for each specific instance.
trans-unit.target: InstanceId 也是不同的每个特定实例。

trans-unit.source: For example, an activity that is processed in a loop would have a different InstanceId for each cycle through the loop while the <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A> would remain the same.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在循环中处理的活动将为每个循环时具有不同的 InstanceId<xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>将保持不变。</xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance ID of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活动的实例 ID。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name associated with the activity
trans-unit.target: 获取与活动关联的名称

trans-unit.source: The activity name.
trans-unit.target: 活动名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"></xref> object
trans-unit.target: 获取的字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"></xref>对象

trans-unit.source: The activity name, ID, instance ID and type name.
trans-unit.target: 活动名称、 ID、 实例 ID 和类型名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 获取活动的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The type name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 活动的类型名称。
